name: Elvez Hide Entry Header
author: Elvez Inc,

sections.description:
Hide entry header in singular page or post.
You can display more simply your articles.

投稿・固定ページの記事ヘッダーを非表示にすることができます。
あなたの記事をよりシンプルに表示できます。

A few notes about the sections above:

  • Hide a page or post entry header (include title, categories and meta informations).
  • Keep each titles in the case of list view (such as search result).

他にも使いやすいWordpressプラグインをご用意しています。
We provide other useful WordPress plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elvez-hide-entry-header directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard->Elvez Hide Entry Header to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Update tested version.

1.0.4

  • Update stylesheet.

1.0.3

  • Support WooCommerce product header.

1.0.2

  • Fix logic to detect singular page.
  • Add ja language file.

1.0.1

  • Add submenu.

1.0.0

  • Release the plugin.
